attributes.additional_details: This is petition to be clearly shown and stated the long term goals and chemicals that are been used and sprayed into the atmosphere in Geo engineering and weather modification to clearly state in depth the aerosols that are spayed and the chemicals clearly stated what they are and how hazardous they can be to the human in take. How this is going effect the climate. To be made public the information and be analysed by an independent science researcher and a proper report stating every detail for the public to see regards the above. We can see what is in the chem trails and deserve the truth about these.
